title: Easy Model P-40B/C Warhawk 3rd Squadron China Building Kit
features: Hand assembled and hand painted model
Highly detailed throughout including fine panel lines and cockpit detailing
Molded completely in plastic to ensure fine detail
Display stand to show the aircraft in flight included
description: The P-40 fighter-bomber was the last of the famous "Hawk" line produced by Curtiss Aircraft in the 1930s and 1940s and it shared certain design elements with its predecessors. It was the third-most numerous US fighter of World War II.
